name: Cubic Lode Runner
synopsis: Lode Runner is a classic platform game that first saw the light of day in 1981 for the Apple ][. Cubic Lode Runner adds the 3rd dimension to the game, allowing the player to dig holes in all 4 directions instead of left/right only. The level can now rotate via the R1/L1 buttons. The game includes a level editor, similar to the 8bit original.
